Class TurnTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.TurnTracker

  • public class TurnTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps track of whose turn it is, as well as what part of their turn it is.

    Jordan

      • passTurn

        public void passTurn()
              throws InvalidActionException
        Passes the turn to the next player
        Throws:
        InvalidActionException - if the current player cannot pass their turn
        Preconditions
        The current player has finished all mandatory actions
        Postconditions
        Control is passed onto the next player
